title: St Donat's Church College and Lighthouse Circular Walk Route

images.title: Peter Wasp / St.Donat’s Bay and beyond, Vale of Glamorgan.
images.caption: St.Donats Bay and beyond, Vale of Glamorgan. Looking east from the sea wall at St.Donats College towards Tresilian Bay and Llantwit Major.

description: A 9 mile circular walk along the beautiful Glamorgan Heritage Coastline. On the way you'll visit the Nash Point lighthouse, Llantwit Major and St Donat's Castle and church. There's some interesting historical sites and wonderful coastal views to enjoy in this splendid area.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: The Southerndown and Ogmore Coastal Walk and the Merthyr Mawr Sand Dunes Walk are two other walking highlights of the area to try.

county: Bro Morgannwg - the Vale of Glamorgan
